item.title: Coding blog with colored code snippets(.md posts)
item.description: We can make our code snippets more intersting and readable by sharing code with color formatting. To turn on colors, just add language short name ðŸ˜‰ For C# code, add cs after ```. ```cs write your code here ``` Example: static void Main(string[] args) { Logging logger = new Logging(); logger.Log("login success"); }
